text: Gray aliens, or just Grays, are a type of alien in Popular culture. They have big, black, almond-shaped eyes and gray skin that gives them their name. They appear in stories told by people who say they actually met aliens, as well as Science fiction. The emoji ðŸ‘½ (or U+1F47D in Unicode) is usually rendered as a gray alien. Category:Extraterrestrial life Category:Science fiction
title: Grey alien
